channel.title: Pericarp on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Pericarp on funPlantGenes

item.title: Cm-ERS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ERS1 Gene Name: ethylene response sensor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Transgenic Lotus japonicus with an Ethylene Receptor Gene Cm-ERS1/H70A Enhances Formation of Infection Threads and Nodule Primordia.

item.title: Cm-ETR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Cm-ETR1 Gene Name: ethylene receptor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In fully enlarged fruit the level of Cm-ERS1 mRNA was low in all tissues, whereas that of Cm-ETR1 mRNA was very high in the seeds and placenta.

item.title: PsAFB6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsAFB6 Gene Name: TIR1/AFB 6 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Pericarp PsAFB6 expression was suppressed by seeds and increased in response to deseeding, and exogenous hormone treatments suggest that seed-derived auxin and deseeding-induced ethylene are involved in these responses, respectively.

item.title: Sl-IAA17
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Sl-IAA17 Gene Name: auxin/indole acetic acid 17 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The Auxin Sl-IAA17 Transcriptional Repressor Controls Fruit Size Via the Regulation of Endoreduplication-Related Cell Expansion.

item.title: SlCOBRA-like
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCOBRA-like Gene Name: COBRA-like gene Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: We identified a tomato gene (SlCOBRA-like) homologous to Arabidopsis COBRA, and determined its role in fleshy fruit biology.

item.title: SlKIX9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g059700 Gene Symbol: SlKIX9 Gene Name: KINASE-INDUCIBLE DOMAIN INTERACTING 9 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlKIX8 and SlKIX9 are negative regulators of leaf and fruit growth in tomato.

item.title: SlKLUH
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g114940 Gene Symbol: SlKLUH Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Differential expression of SlKLUH controlling fruit and seed weight is associated with changes in lipid metabolism and photosynthesis-related genes.

item.title: SlNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of tomato SlNAC1transcription factor alters fruit pigmentation and softening.

item.title: SlPP2C5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g121880 Gene Symbol: SlPP2C5 Gene Name: type 2C protein phosphatase5 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression and RNAi of SlPP2C5 affects fruit ripening onset and quality.
